title: Looking Inward: Devotional Reading and the Private Self in Late Medieval England

This is not to say that there is no concern with spiritual health in the Stimulus Amoris. On the contrary, there are moments in the text that show a concern with the health of the soul – or the lack thereof – and with Christ as a healer: Christ is the shop full of spices
The Prickynge, however, enhances these core images and themes
